Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield City Council's Children and Young People's Directorate. Responsible for statutory assessment, placement and review of children with special educational needs (SEN) in accordance with the SEN Code of Practice. Parents are invited to a special meeting once the authority has agreed to assess their child's special needs. This is a meeting for parents where Education Officers explain the process and answer general questions. There are opportunities then or at a later date to respond to individual queries. Information is available at the meeting about the Parent Partnership Service (see separate entry).
